questions.question_text_1: Which of the following activity is not part of Software development life cycle?
question_texts: Which of the following activity is not part of Software development life cycle?

options.option_text: Design and architecture of software modules.
Surveying for probable audience of the software.
Adding new features as desired by the customer.

options.option_text: It accepts all the binary strings that have even number of 0s.
It accepts all the binary strings that have odd number of 1s.
It accepts all the binary strings ending with 100.
It accepts all possible binary strings.

questions.question_text_1: Consider a typical primary storage system that provides high availability to the users of this system. The system is designed in a way to provide quick responses and fault tolerance for the stored data. The maximum response time for any query is defined and the system is required to return the results within that time.  Suppose the system is designed to provide X amount of storage and currently on X/2 storage is utilized, and we want to test the response time of several queries. The testing that is done to test this is called as,

options.option_text: Complete path coverage is infeasible for a graph containing a loop.
An effective test case should run a loop for every iteration.
Prime path coverage will always subsume edge-pair coverage.
Prime path coverage subsumes Complete Round-trip coverage.
